name: Add new Pipedrive deals as rows in Google Sheets
description: Streamline your sales process by automatically logging new deals in Pipedrive into Google Sheets. With this template, every time a new deal is created in Pipedrive, Make will instantly add a new row in your Google Sheets, ensuring you have a comprehensive and organized record of all your deals for easy tracking and analysis. This integration helps you maintain accurate data and enhances your ability to monitor sales performance effectively.
